title: HUGE Brighton Studio WITH AN ALCOVE-PARKING Available-9/1!
posting_body: Parking:: off-street parking is available for rent
Very large studio with a SEPARATE KITCHEN and a SLEEPING ALCOVE, just steps away from the C and D trains on the Brighton/Brookline line, available 9/1!
This beautiful unit features hardwood floors, high ceilings, large windows, great light, a HUGE alcove off of the living/sleeping space and GREAT CLOSET SPACE!
There's laundry in the building, ADDITIONAL STORAGE  and monthly rent includes heat and hot water.
Off street parking is available for rent and for further information and showings call Heidi at 617-699-4568!
